text: Hygrobatidae is a family of prostigs in the order Trombidiformes. There are about 9 genera and at least 40 described species in Hygrobatidae. ==Genera== * Aciculacarus * Aspidiobates * Atractides C. L. Koch, 1837 * Australiobates * Hopkinsobates * Hygrobates C. L. Koch, 1837 * Notohygrobates * Zelandobatella * Zelandobates ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Trombidiformes
title: Hygrobatidae
